title: Can't connect to game after champ select.
body: I've tried pressing the reconnect button, relogging, and restarting my computer and nothing. It was on both ARAM and Ranked Summoner's Rift. What's going on, Riot? {{sticker:darius-angry}}

replies.body: I hadn't played league in 1 week now because of this stupid bug, it go into the game client, I tried to reconnect but it keep saying crash dump.{{champion:202}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3072}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
same here, i have had a ticket about it on support for a long time and nothing, no response and on other posts about it riot hasnt made a comment about it, its actually like theyre avoiding it
